message: I started with Cocoa Dev Central's 'Learn Objective-C' (http://cocoadevcentral.com/d/learn%5Fobjectivec/), but also read the one @chrisledet said.
I've always used http://www.cocoabuilder.com/ and http://www.cocoadev.com/

been teaching myself objective-c for about 20 days now. i highly recommend Pragmatic Cocoa Programming for experienced developers. you'll quickly pick up the language and then apply things you learned with Cocoa development.
iPhone Dev SDK forums have been a huge help to me. :)
I was hoping this would be a bit more active. :/
Ah well, I'll give it some time...
